summary: This bill, H.R. 931, authorizes the mining of federal coal reserves under Federal Coal Lease MTM 97988 in accordance with the Bull Mountains Mining Plan Modification (Amendment 3). It specifies that the Secretary of the Interior must approve the modification within 30 days of the bill's enactment and defines the specific federal land (approximately 800 acres in Musselshell County, Montana) affected by this authorization.
